entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:10 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 2:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 2:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
